name: A Desert Fable
description:
"Three brothers tried to escape Death.  Learn their stories, then seek the hidden oasis."

A Desert Fable is a short, atmospheric game downloadable for Windows.

You are trapped in a dream-like desert. Examine mementos to glimpse into the past and try to find out what happened to the three brothers. Only by learning their secrets do you have any hope of reaching the oasis, your sole chance of escaping the moonlit sands.

Careful. The desert is not as lonely as it seems.

Game time: Around 5-10 minutes.
